thought: To craft a cyan carpet, I need to first craft a cyan dye. To craft a cyan dye, I need to craft a blue dye. To craft a blue dye, I need to smelt lapis ore. Therefore, I will smelt the lapis ore from slot 35 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 35 to slot 12 with quantity 1
